### [Constants](/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioFileStreamSeekFlags#Constants)

[`static var offsetIsEstimated: AudioFileStreamSeekFlags`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiofilestreamseekflags/offsetisestimated)This flag is returned by the [`AudioFileStreamSeek(_:_:_:_:)`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiofilestreamseek(_:_:_:_:)) function if the byte offset is only an estimate.### [Initializers](/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioFileStreamSeekFlags#Initializers)
